body_html:
@facaiy Well not exactly, sparse_tile_like is much easier rather than tf.gather_nd on SparseTensor. Implementing all features included in tf.gather_nd seems much harder.

I would be pleased to have a try when an idea comes to my mind.
body_text:
@facaiy Well not exactly, sparse_tile_like is much easier rather than tf.gather_nd on SparseTensor.  Implementing all features included in tf.gather_nd seems much harder.
I would be pleased to have a try when an idea comes to my mind.
body:
@facaiy Well not exactly, `sparse_tile_like` is much easier rather than `tf.gather_nd` on `SparseTensor`.  Implementing all features included in `tf.gather_nd` seems much harder. 

I would be pleased to have a try when an idea comes to my mind.
